data.eml:eml: On the identity of Ashlockobius Slater & Slater and Villalobosothignus Brailovsky (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Rhyparochromidae: Myodochini), with the description of a new arboreal species from Ecuador

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dellapé, Pablo Matías, Montemayor, Sara Itzel (2011): On the identity of Ashlockobius Slater & Slater and Villalobosothignus Brailovsky (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Rhyparochromidae: Myodochini), with the description of a new arboreal species from Ecuador. Zootaxa 2748: 47-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.207580
